name: Change is Good
description:
I made this in the last 24 hours

A game like One finger death punch .

the goal is to survive, and thats it.

the enemies spawn faster as time goes by.

when your hp reaches 0 you die (and have to restart the game to start over)

(i dont know if the mac and linux versions work or not)

I wanted a lot more from this project but i didnt have the time to do so.

I wanted to add 4 types of monsters that could attack  in waves,

Ultimate abilities for each character, and more...

(also the 4 character dosnt work)

Character switch up and down:

W and ARROW UP

S and  ARROW

Attack left and right:

A and ARROW LEFT

D and ARROW RIGHT
